title: Endpoint Security & Ransomware Defense
description: Led architecture and development of endpoint protection and data security products with focus on ransomware defense and secure data storage.
fullDescription: A comprehensive endpoint security suite providing real-time protection against ransomware, keyloggers, and malicious threats. Features proactive detection algorithms, secure data encryption, and automated threat remediation.
problem: Organizations faced evolving ransomware threats that traditional antivirus couldn't address. Endpoint security needed to move from signature-based to behavior-based detection.
constraints: Must operate with minimal system overhead. Required support for diverse Windows environments while maintaining detection accuracy.
approach: Built behavior-based detection algorithms combined with signature analysis. Implemented secure data storage with encryption and sandboxed analysis for suspicious files.
tradeoffs: Chose lower false-positive rates over aggressive blocking to minimize user disruption. Accepted some detection latency for improved accuracy.
execution: Multi-year development across SE-OPS product line. Built and evolved security orchestration workflows in collaboration with product, compliance, and operations teams.
outcomes: Protected client systems from emerging ransomware threats. Delivered reliable, hardened agents emphasizing performance, maintainability, and secure-by-design patterns.
whatIdImprove: Would have built more extensive telemetry and threat intelligence sharing capabilities earlier.
